alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fremont County through 315 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Castle Gardens, or 24 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Castle Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
